text: Marielle Stiles Heller (born October 1, 1979) is an American screenwriter, director, and actress. She is the writer and director of the movie The Diary of a Teenage Girl. In January 2018, it was announced that Heller would direct a biopic about Fred Rogers called A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood with Tom Hanks as Mr. Rogers. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Marin County, California Category:Screenwriters from California Category:Movie directors from California
title: Marielle Heller
